item.title: mindless mindfulness
item.description: I used this phrase in my meaningless indicators of progress post. Some other uses of it, just so I manage to put it in an appropriate context: Chronicle of Higher Education has a story called The Art of Living Mindfully on the work of Ellen Langer. Her blog is not frequent but it is thoughtful. We have been explicitly and implicitly taught by our culture to be mindless. We have been taught absolutes when none really exist independent of context.
